title: Remove all caller checks from backend to ensure complete anonymity

requirements.text: Remove or nullify all caller authorization checks in backend/main.mo to ensure all functions execute without authentication validation

quotes: you dont have to rebuild it. just remove the caller checks from all functions in main.mo, if you cant remove them ignore them/nullify

acceptanceCriteria: All functions in main.mo execute without performing caller identity checks
No authorization logic blocks anonymous users from any functionality
All chatroom and messaging operations work without authentication

constraints: Do not rebuild the entire application
Preserve existing GIF display functionality from Version 290
Maintain complete anonymity - no authentication required
